name: Orange Blueberry Multigrain Loaf
description: Orange Blueberry Multigrain Loaf. Orange Juice, Blueberry Compote, and Multigrain Cereal. Vegan Recipe.

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the water and add cereal to it. Cook for 5 minutes then cool to a warm 110. Add the yeast and mix well. Let stand for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Boil the water and add cereal to it. Cook for 5 minutes then cool to a warm 110. Add the yeast and mix well. Let stand for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: In the mixer bowl add the flours, salt and mix well
recipeInstructions.name: In the mixer bowl add the flours, salt and mix well

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the yeast mixture, softened butter, egg, blueberry compote and half of the orange juice.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the yeast mixture, softened butter, egg, blueberry compote and half of the orange juice.

recipeInstructions.text: Knead the dough for 8-10 minutes, scraping sides every 2-3 minutes. add more flour or orange juice in little quantities if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Knead the dough for 8-10 minutes, scraping sides every 2-3 minutes. add more flour or orange juice in little quantities if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in a covered container in a warm place for 1.5-2 hours. Spritz the top of dough with some oil spray.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in a covered container in a warm place for 1.5-2 hours. Spritz the top of dough with some oil spray.

recipeInstructions.text: Punch it lightly and shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides, or by rolling it out into a rectangle and rolling the rectangle from one side and tucking the edges under.
recipeInstructions.name: Punch it lightly and shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides, or by rolling it out into a rectangle and rolling the rectangle from one side and tucking the edges under.

recipeInstructions.text: Place loaf in greased bread pan. Spritz the top with a little oil spray and cover with damp towel.
recipeInstructions.name: Place loaf in greased bread pan. Spritz the top with a little oil spray and cover with damp towel.

recipeInstructions.text: Place it in a warm place or warm oven for about an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Place it in a warm place or warm oven for about an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove towel, spritz top with some water and bake at 375 degrees F for 40-45 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove towel, spritz top with some water and bake at 375 degrees F for 40-45 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove bread from pan and let cool for atleast an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove bread from pan and let cool for atleast an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: I usually refrigerate it for another hour before slicing. The breads are usually quite fluffy and soft and refrigeration makes them a bit firm for nice and clean slices!
recipeInstructions.name: I usually refrigerate it for another hour before slicing. The breads are usually quite fluffy and soft and refrigeration makes them a bit firm for nice and clean slices!

keywords: fruit bread, multigrain bread, vegan bread recipe
